Description.Text: The New Yorker Hotel is one of the most popular New York City hotels in Manhattan. This midtown Manhattan hotel has a proud history of providing high quality accommodations and hotel services to an international clientele of business, leisure, weddings, and group travelers to New York City. The New Yorker Hotel is conveniently located in Midtown Manhattan on 34th St and the corner of 8th avenue. The Hotel is approximately 27 Km. from JFK Airport.

• Madison Square Garden - 1 block • Penn Station - 1 block • Jacob K. Javits Convention Center - 3 blocks • Empire State Building - 4 blocks • Times Square/Theater District - 8 blocks • Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum - 8 blocks • Central Park - 1 mile • Rockefeller Center - 1 mile • Saks Fifth Avenue - 1 mile • Ferries to Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island - 3 miles

This New York hotel offers 860 guestrooms and suites, all with complimentary wireless Internet access. All are located above the 18th floor, and many have impressive city views. Tower Suites include complimentary daily Continental breakfast in the 39th-floor Sky Lounge, with sweeping views of the city, including the Empire State Building, Chrysler Building, Statue of Liberty, and Hudson River.

Two great restaurants, 2 majestic ballrooms, and 14 meeting and conference rooms, serving from 10 to 700 guests; ideal space for meetings, The Grand Ballroom with 7,500 square feet of floor space, ideal for tradeshows and large weddings. The New Yorker is just across from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station and it is the closest major hotel to the Javits Convention Center. The Empire State Building and Macy’s are just down the street. A few minutes' walk and you're in the Theater District and the new Times Square entertainment area.
• Major credit cards are accepted. • Small pets only • Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

• La Vigna Restaurante & Bar – Great semi formal dining with northern Italian cuisine. • Tick Tock Diner – New York’s popular 24-hour diner serves traditional and healthy meals; delivery to your guest room. • Café New Yorker – offer an array of pastries, coffee flavors, espressos, and cappuccinos plus light snacks for breakfast and lunch.

• La Vigna Restaurante & Bar – Great semi formal dining with northern Italian cuisine. • Tick Tock Diner – New York’s popular 24-hour diner serves traditional and healthy meals; delivery to your guest room. • Café New Yorker – offer an array of pastries, coffee flavors, espressos, and cappuccinos plus light snacks for breakfast and lunch.
